questions.question: How long does it take to receive an order?
questions.answer: Standard domestic orders typically arrive within 3-5 business days. International shipping times may vary.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email confirmation with a tracking number and a link to the carrier's website.

questions.question: What are the shipping costs?
questions.answer: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your order's weight and destination. We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $75.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Please note that international orders may be subject to customs duties and taxes, which are the responsibility of the customer.

questions.question: My order says delivered, but I haven't received it.
questions.answer: Please check with your neighbors or building manager first. If you still cannot locate your package, please contact our support team at support@example.com, and we will assist you.

questions.question: How do I start a return or exchange?
questions.answer: You can start a return or exchange by visiting our online returns portal. You will need your order number and the email address used to place the order.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We accept returns on unworn, unwashed items with original tags attached within 30 days of the delivery date. Final sale items are not eligible for return.

questions.question: How long does the refund process take?
questions.answer: Once we receive and inspect your return, please allow 5-7 business days for your refund to be processed. You will receive an email notification once your refund is complete.

questions.question: Are return shipping labels provided?
questions.answer: For domestic returns, a prepaid return shipping label will be provided. For exchanges, the return shipping is free. For refunds, a small $5 fee for the label will be deducted from your total refund amount.

questions.question: What if I received a damaged item?
questions.answer: We sincerely apologize for that! Please contact our customer support team within 48 hours of receiving your order with photos of the damaged item, and we will arrange for a replacement immediately.

questions.question: Where are we based?
questions.answer: We are based in Jaipur, India. We do not have any physical stores at this time.

questions.question: Do you offer product customizations?
questions.answer: Currently, we do not offer customizations or monogramming services. All products are sold as-is on the website.

questions.question: When is a token amount required for COD?
questions.answer: A token amount is required for Cash on Delivery (COD) orders over a certain value to confirm the order. This amount is non-refundable if the order is canceled or returned.

questions.question: Do you offer a warranty?
questions.answer: We offer a 6-month warranty on manufacturing defects. This does not cover normal wear and tear, damage from misuse, or water damage.

questions.question: Do you use genuine leather?
questions.answer: Yes, all our leather products are made from 100% genuine, high-quality leather. Please check the product description for specific details.

questions.question: What are the international shipping costs?
questions.answer: International shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your destination and the weight of your package.

questions.question: How can I place an international order?
questions.answer: Simply add items to your cart and proceed to checkout. Enter your international shipping address, and the available shipping options and costs will be displayed.

questions.question: What payment options are available for international orders?
questions.answer: For all international orders, payment must be prepaid using PayPal or Razorpay. Cash on Delivery (COD) is not available for these transactions.

questions.question: Are there additional fees for international orders?
questions.answer: Your order may be subject to import duties and taxes (including VAT), which are incurred once a shipment reaches your destination country. Our company is not responsible for these charges.

questions.question: What is the return policy for international orders?
questions.answer: Due to the complexities of international shipping and customs, all international sales are final and not eligible for return or exchange. Please contact us if you receive a defective item.

questions.question: How can I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can reach our team via email at support@example.com, by phone at +91-1234567890, or on WhatsApp at the same number.

questions.question: What are your customer service hours?
questions.answer: Our team is available Monday to Friday, from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST. We are closed on weekends and public holidays.

questions.question: Where can I follow you on social media?
questions.answer: You can follow us on Instagram and Facebook @YourBrandName for the latest updates, new arrivals, and special promotions.

questions.question: Do you have a physical store?
questions.answer: We are currently an online-only brand and do not have any physical retail locations. All orders can be placed through our website.

questions.question: I'm a brand/influencer, how can I collaborate?
questions.answer: For all collaboration and press inquiries, please email us at collaborations@example.com with your proposal and media kit.
